pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Open Source Implementation of the 'ArcGIS' Toolbox 'STARS' // An open source implementation of the 'STARS' toolbox (Peterson Ver Hoef, 2014, doi:10.18637/jss.v056.i02) using 'R' and 'GRASS GIS'. It prepares the *.ssn object needed for the 'SSN' package. A Digital Elevation Model (DEM) is used to derive stream networks (in contrast to 'STARS' that can clean an existing stream network).
